q: Eric Schmidt said Page also will take the lead product development and technology strategy, while Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and have the title co-founder. As executive chairman, Eric Schmidt said he would concentrate on external deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought-leadership that are increasingly important, given Google's global reach, and act as an adviser to Page and Sergey Brin . wake of the Tucson tragedy, politicians from both sides of the aisle have called for a more civil discourse in our political debate. On CBS's Face the Nation this morning, John McCain ( R-AZ) said, There is a lack of respect in our dialogue.... We shouldn't mistake passion for advocacy. In other words, passion is necessary in this debate that we're having, but we've got to make sure it doesn't spill over into personal attacks and impugning people's character or patriotism. : With the Blazers in front by seven after LaMarcus Aldridge 's basket with 1:46 remaining, they failed to score on three straight possessions.
